snippet: Preaching basics in his first season managing, Robin Ventura has the White Sox two games ahead of the Tigers, who are led by the grizzled and veteran Jim Leyland.
abstract: Detroit Tigers defeat their American League Central rivals the Chicago White Sox, 5-3, in the second game of a four-game series that pits baseball’s most senior manager Jim Leyland of Detroit, against its greenest, Robin Ventura of the White Sox.
lead_paragraph: Preaching basics in his first season managing, Robin Ventura has the White Sox two games ahead of the Tigers, who are led by the grizzled and veteran Jim Leyland.

headline.seo: In A.L. Central, It’s Old School vs. Older School
headline.main: In A.L. Central Race, It’s Old School vs. Older School
headline.print_headline: In A.L. Central Race, It’s Old School vs. Older School
